actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to prohibit changes to the schedule for rating disabilities used by the Veterans' Administration unless Congress first approves such changes.

summary.text: Provides that no changes or readjustments in the schedule for rating disabilities made by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs shall be effective unless: (1) such proposed damage or readjustment is first submitted to Congress, and (2) neither House of Congress, prior to the expiration of ninety calendar days of continuous session of Congress following the date of submission of the proposed change or readjustment, has adopted a resolution stating in substance that the House does not favor the proposed change or readjustment. (Adds 38 U.S.C. 355(b))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to prohibit changes to the schedule for rating disabilities used by the Veterans' Administration unless Congress first approves such changes.
